rules: Rule1: Either the legislation requires approval for the material or the legislation becomes law.
Rule2: The industry group either supports the legislation or opposes the legislation.
Rule3: Should the industry group oppose the legislation, then whenever the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.

Rule4: If the scientific team conducts research on the material, then under the condition that the industry group supports the legislation, if the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.
Rule5: The scientific team conducts research on the material or publishes findings on the disease.

Rule6: If the government agency approves funding for the legislation, then on the condition that the regulatory body holds a hearing on the legislation, whenever the scientific team publishes findings on the disease, and if the industry group supports the legislation, then should the committee pass the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.

Rule7: Provided that the government agency rejects funding for the legislation, if the regulatory body holds a hearing on the legislation, then whenever the scientific team publishes findings on the disease, under the condition that the industry group supports the legislation, should the committee pass the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.
Rule8: Either the material is banned from extraction in the natural place or its usage is restricted in the natural place.
Rule9: If the politician proposes an amendment to the legislation, then the legislation does not weaken protection of the natural place.
Rule10: Under the condition that the politician introduces an exemption to the legislation, the legislation does not weaken protection of the natural place.
Rule11: If the politician gathers support for the amendment, then they propose an amendment to the legislation.
Rule12: Provided that the politician builds a coalition for the exemption, they introduce an exemption to the legislation.
Rule13: Either the amendment receives endorsement from the organization or the exemption gains backing from the industry.
Rule14: Whenever the exemption gains backing from the industry, then either the politician gathers support for the amendment or builds a coalition for the exemption.
Rule15: If the legislative leader schedules a vote on the amendment, then it is not the case that the amendment fails consideration by the legislative body.
Rule16: The legislative leader either schedules a vote on the amendment or tables the proposal for the amendment.
Rule17: Given that the legislative leader tables the proposal for the amendment, then the amendment does not fail consideration by the legislative body.
Rule18: Should the usage of the material be restricted in the natural place, then it is not the case that the legislation requires approval for the material.
Rule19: If the research team identifies a hazard in the material, then whenever the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.
Rule20: Provided that the environmental group advocates for action on the legislation, the regulatory body does not ignore the evidence from the research.
Rule21: Either the environmental group advocates for action on the legislation or the industry group challenges the findings of the research.
Rule22: Under the condition that the industry group challenges the findings of the research, the regulatory body does not ignore the evidence from the research.
Rule23: Whenever the expert panel reviews the evidence from the research, they make a recommendation to the regulatory body.
Rule24: The expert panel either reviews the evidence from the research or disputes the conclusions of the research.

Rule25: Provided that the expert panel disputes the conclusions of the research, then if the scientific team publishes findings on the disease, and under the condition that the industry group supports the legislation, should the committee pass the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law.
Rule26: Provided that the legislative committee demands an investigation of the regulatory body, the regulatory body does not dismiss concerns from the panel.
Rule27: Whenever the regulatory body accepts the findings of the panel, then if the legislative committee requests a review from the panel, they demand an investigation of the regulatory body.

Rule28: Under the condition that the regulatory body rejects the conclusions of the panel, then should the legislative committee request a review from the panel, they demand an investigation of the regulatory body.

Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that if the scientific team publishes findings on the disease, then should the industry group support the legislation, if the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law, then the legislative body removes restrictions from the legislation.

Rule30: Should it not be the case that either the government agency approves funding for the legislation or rejects funding for the legislation, then the legislation delays implementation according to the timeline.

Rule31: If it is not the case that either the government agency approves funding for the legislation or rejects funding for the legislation, then the legislation does not delay implementation according to the timeline.

Rule32: Provided that it is not the case that if the legislative body removes restrictions from the legislation, then it amends provisions of the legislation, the legislation weakens protection of the natural place.

Rule33: If it is not the case that if the amendment receives endorsement from the organization, then either the politician gathers support for the amendment or builds a coalition for the exemption, then the amendment fails consideration by the legislative body.

Rule34: Should it not be the case that if the expert panel makes a recommendation to the regulatory body, then whenever the scientific team publishes findings on the disease, and provided that the industry group supports the legislation, if the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law, then the regulatory body dismisses concerns from the panel.

Rule35: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the expert panel makes a recommendation to the regulatory body, then should the scientific team publish findings on the disease, and if the industry group supports the legislation, whenever the committee passes the legislation by vote, the legislation becomes law, then the legislative committee requests a review from the panel.

Rule36: Provided that it is not the case that either the material causes disease in the population or, if the material is banned from extraction in the natural place, then it is not the case that the legislation requires approval for the material, a game is created using the material.

Rule37: If it is not the case that either the regulatory body accepts the findings of the panel or rejects the conclusions of the panel, then the regulatory body faces a lawsuit from the organization.

Rule38: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the regulatory body accepts the findings of the panel or rejects the conclusions of the panel, the regulatory body does not face a lawsuit from the organization.

Rule39: If it is not the case that if the legislation protects the natural area, then under the condition that it is not the case that either the material causes disease in the population or, if the material is banned from extraction in the natural place, then it is not the case that the legislation requires approval for the material, a game is not created using the material, then the legislation does not enforce a penalty for violations.

Rule40: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the legislation protects the natural area, then should it not be the case that either the material causes disease in the population or, if the material is banned from extraction in the natural place, then it is not the case that the legislation requires approval for the material, a game is not created using the material, then the legislation enforces a penalty for violations, then the legislation provides funding for conservation.

Rule41: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that if the legislation protects the natural area, then under the condition that it is not the case that either the material causes disease in the population or, if the material is banned from extraction in the natural place, then it is not the case that the legislation requires approval for the material, a game is not created using the material, then the legislation enforces a penalty for violations, then the legislation does not provide funding for conservation.

Rule42: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the research team does not identify a hazard in the material, then it is not the case that the research team confirms a link to the disease, then the health agency issues a warning about the material, then the regulatory body updates regulations on the material, then the regulatory body ignores the evidence from the research.
Rule43: If the research team does not identify a hazard in the material, then the research team confirms a link to the disease.
facts: Fact1: The regulatory body holds a hearing on the legislation.
Fact2: The legislation protects the natural area.
Fact3: The committee passes the legislation by vote.
Fact4: The legislative body does not amend provisions of the legislation.
Fact5: The health agency does not issue a warning about the material.
Fact6: The regulatory body does not update regulations on the material.
Fact7: The material does not cause disease in the population.
